SOHO.OL.summary: Sonans Holding AS operates in the education market in Norway. It provides online studies in the fields of psychology, health, and social sciences, as well as vocational IT education services. It also operates 14 private candidate schools; and facilitates the transfer of students to partner universities abroad. In addition, the company engages in the trading and investment of real property, securities, and other assets; higher education teaching; research and professional development; and development of teaching aid and counseling activities. Further, it operates vocational school and offers other educational services. Sonans Holding AS was founded in 1989 and is based in Oslo, Norway.
